welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Ronchin, known for its quaint streets and delicious local cuisine. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lesquin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kortrijk Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
